title: A new approach to large DOM and virtual scrollers using display locking
summary: Describe our work on using display locking to prototype the virtual-scroller custom element that allows large amounts of content to be present in the DOM without causing performance problems. This is an alternative to virtualization which often breaks accessibility, indexability and in-page find.
goals: Raise awareness and start discussion about this problem and solution. Demonstrate a use-case for display locking.
